projectDescription: SmartAgro Connect is a comprehensive B2B agricultural marketplace platform that revolutionizes how farmers, agents, and wholesale buyers interact in the agricultural supply chain. By eliminating intermediaries and ensuring transparency, it creates a more efficient and profitable ecosystem. The platform features multi-role dashboards, real-time product catalogs, AI-powered crop recommendations, plant disease detection, smart irrigation planning, and secure payment processing with Stripe.
features: Multi-role dashboard system (Admin, Regional Agent, Seller/Farmer, Consumer/Wholesale Buyer) with role-based access control.
Real-time product catalog with advanced filtering, search, and bulk ordering; order management with tracking and delivery coordination.
AI-powered crop recommendations, plant disease detection, and smart irrigation planning with 5-day weather-based recommendations.
Secure payment integration with Stripe; application and verification system for sellers and agents with admin approval workflow.
Firebase Authentication with JWT; responsive design, dashboard analytics with Recharts, and real-time notifications (React Hot Toast).

projectDescription: Easy Bank is a comprehensive, full-stack banking application built with React, Vite, and Firebase. It features secure user authentication (email/password, Google, GitHub), dashboard management with profile and transaction history, credit request application and tracking, and administrative controls for user management, credit processing, and platform oversight.
features: Secure authentication via Firebase (email/password, Google, GitHub); dashboard with profile, account status, and transaction history.
Credit management: apply for and track credit requests; detailed transaction tracking and account activity.
Admin: user management, credit request approval/denial, transaction oversight, and bank status dashboard with real-time metrics.
Responsive, mobile-first design with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI; protected routes and JWT for API communication.

projectDescription: Trip_Flip is a hotel management web application for exploring and booking hotel services worldwide. Users sign up, book rooms, manage bookings, and share experiences through a user-friendly interface.
features: Sign up with credentials or Google/GitHub. Book rooms and edit booking info.
After checkout, post a review that appears on the home and rooms pages.

projectDescription: Artisan Haven showcases textile art and craft. Artists display work; enthusiasts explore crafts. Features category-based browsing and user-contributed gallery management.
features: View arts and crafts by category. Register to add, edit, update, or delete your crafts.
